_metadata.description: Background campaigns that systematically improve code health across scenarios

requirements.title: Campaign configuration
requirements.description: Support campaigns with max_sessions, max_files_per_session, priority rules, optional category focus
requirements.notes: Store config in postgres campaigns table - validated via TestAutoCampaign_Configuration

requirements.title: Campaign concurrency limit
requirements.description: Enforce maximum K concurrent auto-tidiness campaigns (default K=3)
requirements.notes: Prevent resource exhaustion and AI cost runaway - validated via TestAutoCampaign_ConcurrencyLimit

requirements.title: Campaign auto-completion - files visited
requirements.description: Transition campaign to 'completed' when all files in scope have at least one visit
requirements.notes: Query visited-tracker for completion status - validated via TestAutoCampaign_AutoCompleteAllFilesVisited

requirements.title: Campaign auto-completion - max sessions
requirements.description: Transition campaign to 'completed' when max_sessions limit reached
requirements.notes: Track session count in campaign state - validated via TestAutoCampaign_AutoCompleteMaxSessions

requirements.title: Campaign pause/resume
requirements.description: Support manual pause and resume of active campaigns from UI
requirements.notes: State transitions: ACTIVE â‡„ PAUSED - validated via TestAutoCampaign_PauseResume

requirements.title: Campaign manual termination
requirements.description: Support manual termination of campaigns before completion
requirements.notes: Preserve partial results and mark as 'terminated' - validated via TestAutoCampaign_ManualTermination

requirements.title: Campaign error detection
requirements.description: Mark campaigns as 'error' on repeated agent failures with visible error reason
requirements.notes: Threshold: 3 consecutive failures triggers error state - validated via TestAutoCampaign_ErrorThreshold

requirements.title: Campaign safety controls
requirements.description: Auto-stop campaigns in error state to prevent resource waste
requirements.notes: Notify via UI/logs when campaign errors out - validated via TestAutoCampaign_ErrorThreshold and TestAutoCampaign_Statistics
